From: Sunil PGeorge <Sunil.George2@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Mohammad Munir <mohammad.munir@chalhoub.com>
CC: Javeed Sathar <Javeed.Sathar@chalhoub.com>; Nancy Avila <Nancy.Avila@chalhoub.com>; Israr Malik <Israr.Malik@chalhoub.com>; Krishna Bahadur <Krishna.Bahadurbk@chalhoub.com>; Shibu Janardhanan <Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-09-22 14:07
Subject: FW: Incident Report-Damaged Barrier
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop,

 

This is to inform you that an accident occurred at the CGL warehouse on Friday morning. A truck hit the barrier gate, and the barrier arm was broken. 

Please find attached the quotation for the replacement with a new barrier arm a total cost of AED 1,890. Could you kindly advise whether we can claim this cost through our insurance? Or we can charge to the truck company. Attached police report for your reference 

@Mohammad Munir <mailto:mohammad.munir@chalhoub.com>  please advise can we go ahead for the replacement? .



 

Best regards

Please find attached the quotation for the replacement with a new barrier arm a total cost of AED 1,890. Could you kindly advise whether we can claim this cost through our insurance? Or we can charge to the truck company. Attached police report for your reference
